content.raw:
I get this error here:

~~~
louisep@hadaly:~/frc_ws/src$ wstool update
[src/frc2016_competition] Fetching ssh://hg@bitbucket.org/osrf/frc2016_competition (version ign-transport-fix) to /home/louisep/frc_ws/src/src/frc2016_competition
remote: Warning: Permanently added the RSA host key for IP address '104.192.143.3' to the list of known hosts.
remote: Permission denied (publickey).
abort: no suitable response from remote hg!
Exception caught during install: Error processing 'src/frc2016_competition' : [src/frc2016_competition] Checkout of ssh://hg@bitbucket.org/osrf/frc2016_competition version ign-transport-fix into /home/louisep/frc_ws/src/src/frc2016_competition failed.

ERROR in config: Error processing 'src/frc2016_competition' : [src/frc2016_competition] Checkout of ssh://hg@bitbucket.org/osrf/frc2016_competition version ign-transport-fix into /home/louisep/frc_ws/src/src/frc2016_competition failed.
~~~
